Module paths
Package edu.ntnu.idatt2001.paths.controllers

Class FileHandlerController

java.lang.Object
edu.ntnu.idatt2001.paths.controllers.FileHandlerController
public class FileHandlerController extends Object
The type File handler controller. This class is responsible for handling the saving and loading of games. It is a singleton class, and can be accessed from anywhere in the program. It can save and load games, both from json and from paths.
Version:
1.3 20.05.2023
Author:
Helle R. and Sander S.

      public Story loadTemplate(String name) throws FileNotFoundException
      A method to load a template from a file. It takes in a name, and loads the template from a file with the name.

      name - the name of the file to be loaded
      Returns:
      the template from the file
      Throws:

    • saveGameJson

      public void saveGameJson(String name, String path, Game game) throws IllegalArgumentException
      A method to save a game to a json file. It takes in a name and a game, and saves the game to a file with the name.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the player, and the name of the file
      game - the game to be saved
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException

    • loadGameJson

      public Game loadGameJson(String name, String path) throws FileNotFoundException

      Parameters:
      name - the name of the file to be loaded
      Returns:
      the game from the json file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
